originalText.text:
My daughter has been in this daycare for a year now. Niurka is the best daycare provider my kids have ever been to. She is so supportive with any family accommodations, great with communication when the daycare will be closed for a holiday. When my child is picked up early she sends her home with her snack in a ziplock bag so that she can eat it at home. I never have to worry about changing her diaper once we get home, every time i picked her up, doesn‚Äôt matter what time it is, she has a clean diaper on. In 1 year i have never had a single complaint about niurka or her daycare service. I feel blessed to have found this wonderful place where we ALL get treated as FAMILY.  My daughter loves this place so much she doesnt even say bye when i drop her off, as soon as she walks in she forgets about us. The kids love this lady so much they call her ‚Äúgrandma‚Äù. My heart will break when my daughter starts school and we will no longer need this daycare for her.

Niurka is an AMAZING woman with a heart of gold!! We all love her and her family.

Don‚Äôt let any miserable parent who couldnt get what they wanted ruin her good image with a bad review full of lies and deceit.

originalText.text: I definitely recommend you this family day care. Mrs Niurka is a very kind women and take care of your child like her own.Every morning my daughter was happy to go there and when I picked her up she was happy. It was with an heartbroken that I have to change her to another daycare because we moved 3 mile away from her location and no direct train. Until today when I drive by her address, if my daughter sees her building she makes a sound of joy and say "mommy mommy" because she used to call her mommy. Children does lie about their feelings. When they feel safe around someone you will know it. Thank you Mrs Niurka for being such a good person to me and my child. May God bless you! A day care like yours is rare!

originalText.text: This family daycare is always HOT! No adequate air in the apartment at all. The lady who runs it has all kinds of people coming in and out of her apartment to help her in the daycare. The establishment is not even in her name! She's racist! She sent my son home with a dirty diaper on more than one occasion, when I called her out on it she screamed at me and told me not to come back! She told me she doesn't discriminate. He had a rash for a month with her, three days away from her, his rash is Gone! She don't even deserve one star. The city needs to shut it down.

originalText.text:
I am trying everything in my power to change child care provider for my 2 year old daughter as well as for  my new bundle of joy due to arrive this year to come to Niurka's Family Group Day Care.  Niurka was the assistant  to my 14 year old  child provider about 11 years ago. she was truly an angel sent from up above. She  was and is so charismatic patient, understanding, and loving with my son. I still keep in contact with her.  My family  and I love her. She helped us out soo much even when he was in school she would pick him up . I have yet to visit her daycare but I trust her 100% with my children . I would recommend her to anyone.

text.text: We have been taking my daughter to this daycare for 4 months now and it has been amazing to have her there. He has learned a lot, he relates better to children and, above all, he eats fruits that he didn't eat at home. I'm very happy to have her there. üòÉ
